alert.note: Alert for East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued February 21 at 3:03PM MST until February 24 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 10 inches possible, with 12 to 20 inches possible above 9,500 feet. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Sangre de Cristo Mountains. * WHEN...From Tuesday morning through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Check road conditions before heading out. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow and blowing snow may create poor visibility at times, including near white-out conditions.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains; Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains
